text: Characterization is the idea of making characters for a narrative.Harrison, Martin. 1998. The Language of Theatre. London: Routledge. .(pp 51-2) It is a literary element and may be used in dramatic works of art or everyday conversation. Characters can be shown by description. They can also be shown through their speech, thoughts, or actions. ==References== ==Other websites== * by Dr. Marilyn H.
